executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Generate and execute ONLY a single frontend test for the scenario file testsprite/scenarios/dev-login.yaml. Do not visit localhost first; test must start by visiting the hosted TARGET_URL. Use these selectors: [data-cy="input-username-email"], [data-cy="input-password"], [data-cy="submit-sign-in-with-password"]. Password must be read from an environment variable at runtime (do not embed or log it). After login, assert [data-testid="nav-bar"] is visible.
